des:
Users need to install Chuan APP and complete registration. Assign a good name to each smart device and communicate with echo by device name when making a voice command.
The setup steps are as followings:
1. Download APP in Android or iOS APP market.
2. Complete APP registration in APP.
3. You need to have Chuan smart devices in hand.
4. Configure the devices then set a suitable name.
5. Open Alexa APP, Search skill“Chuan Life”.
6. Enable the skill.
7. Input APP account and password to link account.
8. Search devices in Alexa APP/Smart home.
9. If we set device name as “Chuan1”, you can try saying following commands to control the device.

As for smart light, set the smart light name as Chuan1 in Chuan Life Light APP.
Lighting control:
-You can turn on/off the light: 
“Alexa, turn on the Chuan1”
“Alexa, turn off the Chuan1”
-You can change the color: 
“Alexa, set the Chuan1 to red”
“Alexa, set the Chuan1 to green”
-You can change the color temperature: 
“Alexa, set the Chuan1 to warm white”
“Alexa, set the Chuan1 to daylight”

As for Switch, set the smart plug name as Chuan1 in Wecnn Plug APP.
Plug control:
-Turn on/off the smart plug
“Alexa, turn on the Chuan1”
“Alexa, turn off the Chuan1”


Currently this skill supports following Chuan products：

-Light series (corresponding APP: see-time Light):
Smart bulb 
Smart alarm lamp
Smart mushroom lamp
Smart colorful glazed lamp
Smart ambient lamp
